springcodingtonportal.controller
Class VisitorController

java.lang.Object
  springcodingtonportal.controller.VisitorController

@Controller
public class VisitorController
extends java.lang.Object

Visitor controller handles all the visitor related transactions with the data classes and triggered by visitormain.jsp
